patthana16.1:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.1:0.3_0: And they appear to the extent of the skillful roots.
patthana16.1:1.0.2_0: ‘ cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause
patthana16.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
patthana16.1:10.1_0: ‘... for the sake of the five reasons.’ ...
patthana16.1:11.1_0: There are no cause or condition for the sake of unkilled in the teaching.
patthana16.1:13.1_0: The eighteen bases for psychic power, the eighteen bases for knowing the important principles, the eighteen bases for psychic power, the five faculties, the ninety-four grounds, and the ninety.
patthana16.1:13.1_2: (This should be expanded in detail as in the chapter.)
patthana16.1:14.1_0: Not knowing the skillful teaching, not for the sake of skillful.
patthana16.1:14.1_1: Not because of the skillful teaching, the cause or condition for the reason.
patthana16.1:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
patthana16.1:2.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the skillful.
patthana16.1:2.1_2: Because of this wholesome quality doesn’t give rise to diversity of phenomena.
patthana16.1:2.1_3: Because of his skillful qualities, not for the sake of cause or reason.
patthana16.1:2.1_4: Because of the skillful qualities don’t arise for the sake of skillful qualities or for the sake of cause.
patthana16.1:3.1_1: For it is unskillful, not the cause or reason for the sake of the unskillful.
patthana16.1:3.1_2: For it is unskillful, not the cause or condition for the sake of deceiveness.
patthana16.1:3.1_3: Because of the unskillful qualities that arise from the unskillful and not for the sake of causes.
patthana16.1:3.1_4: For causes unskillful qualities to arise with the unskillful and not its cause.
patthana16.1:4.1_0: There is no declared by the unskillful.
patthana16.1:4.1_1: There is no answer for an indeterminate person who has not declared: ‘This is a cause.
patthana16.1:4.1_2: Because of not declared by the noble ones, unskillful qualities don’t arise because of not for the sake of cause or reason.
patthana16.1:6.0_0: No Support on the support of the Suport
patthana16.1:6.1_0: Because of the skillful teaching, not for the sake of the skillful.
patthana16.1:8.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana16.1:9.1_0: Not knowing what is the cause or condition for the sake of skillful qualities.
patthana16.1:9.1_1: Understanding the cause or condition for the reason why the teaching is not for the sake of cause or reason.
patthana16.1:9.1_2: Understanding the cause and the reason for this.
patthana16.1:9.1_3: Skilled in the reason for the sake of the skillful and for the sake of deference from the teaching.
patthana16.1:9.1_4: Skillfulness for the sake of skillful and unskillful qualities, not for the sake of the teaching.
